to.description: The number that the message should be sent to. Numbers are specified in E.164 format.
to.title: To

status-report-req.description: Whether to receive a Delivery Receipt
status-report-req.title: Status Report Req

client-ref.description: You can optionally include your own reference of up to 40 characters
client-ref.title: Client Ref

callback.description: The webhook endpoint the delivery receipt for this sms is sent to. This parameter overrides the webhook endpoint you set in Dashboard.
callback.title: Callback

ttl.description: By default Nexmo attempt delivery for 72 hours
ttl.title: TTL (in Minutes)

protocol-id.description: The value of the protocol identifier to use. Ensure that the value is aligned with udh.
protocol-id.title: Protocol ID

account-ref.description: An optional string used to identify separate accounts using the SMS endpoint for billing purposes. To use this feature, please email support@nexmo.com.
account-ref.title: Account Ref

message-class.description: The Data Coding Scheme value of the message
message-class.title: Message Class

message.description: The body of the message being sent
message.title: Message

from.description: The name or number the message should be sent from
from.title: From
